page.title: 19Shops in Ambergate
page.content: {Past and Present}is a very small shop which is about 120 years old.It sells old and modern postcards. They also have old photographs on show which date back to 1905-1930.They vary from today's pop-stars to postcards and photographs of{Ambergate}many years ago.The{Antique Shop}deals mostly in old furniture but it also sells old paintings and pottery.It is a nice big shop which fits in well with this small quiet town.The {Butcher's Shop}is owned by G.A.White and is a family business.The customers vary from weekdays to the weekend. He gets about 100 customers a day from Ambergate,Belper and people passing through.There are two{General Stores.} The one near the{Fish and Chip Shop} sells everything from sticking plaster to beach balls.The{Post Office sells cards,sweets,stamps and plants .
